name: Sacrifight
description:
The time has come for your final showdown with the merciless Demon. Choose how to best utilize your followers to take him out once and for all.

Right click cards to sacrifice their warrior and get a passive ability, or left click cards to have them attack with the listed combat power.

Made for Vim Jam 3, thanks for playing!

Music by Steven O'Brien: https://soundcloud.com/stevenobrien

NOTE: Due to some small text, fullscreen is recommended
